title: NYS FOIL - Bethlehem Central School District Threat Calls (Bethlehem Town Police Department)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

Any and all documents and communications relating to the threats of violence received by the Bethlehem Central School District and the Bethlehem Police Department, and any other Bethlehem agency from September 1, 2024 to current.   Please include all documents and communications, including subpoenas and warrants issued to any third party companies or individuals or other government agencies. 

All audio recordings of the threats of violence received by the Bethlehem Central School District and the Bethlehem Police Department, and any other Bethlehem agency from September 1, 2024 to current. 

The phone number(s) from which above threats of violence originated from.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Douglas-Preston:Lloyd, Agent
